description:
Reentrancy in VerbsAuctionHouse.settleCurrentAndCreateNewAuction() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#112-115):
	External calls:
	- _settleAuction() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#113)
		- verbs.burn(_auction.verbId) (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#288)
		- IWETH(WETH).deposit{value: _amount}() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#354)
		- verbs.transferFrom(address(this),_auction.bidder,_auction.verbId) (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#290)
		- wethSuccess = IWETH(WETH).transfer(_to,_amount) (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#357)
		- creatorTokensEmitted = tokenEmitter.buyToken{value: creatorGovernancePayment}(vrgdaReceivers,vrgdaSplits,address(0),address(0),deployer) (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#329)
	- _createAuction() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#114)
		- verbId = verbs.mint() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#260-269)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _settleAuction() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#113)
		- IWETH(WETH).deposit{value: _amount}() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#354)
		- creatorTokensEmitted = tokenEmitter.buyToken{value: creatorGovernancePayment}(vrgdaReceivers,vrgdaSplits,address(0),address(0),deployer) (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#329)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _createAuction() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#114)
		- auction = Auction({verbId:verbId,amount:0,startTime:startTime,endTime:endTime,bidder:address(0),settled:false}) (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#264)
	VerbsAuctionHouse.auction (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#68) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VerbsAuctionHouse._createAuction() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#259-270)
	- VerbsAuctionHouse.auction (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#68)
	- VerbsAuctionHouse.unpause() (src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#215-221)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [VerbsAuctionHouse.settleCurrentAndCreateNewAuction()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L112-L115):
	External calls:
	- [_settleAuction()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L113)
		- [verbs.burn(_auction.verbId)](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L288)
		- [IWETH(WETH).deposit{value: _amount}()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L354)
		- [verbs.transferFrom(address(this),_auction.bidder,_auction.verbId)](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L290)
		- [wethSuccess = IWETH(WETH).transfer(_to,_amount)](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L357)
		- [creatorTokensEmitted = tokenEmitter.buyToken{value: creatorGovernancePayment}(vrgdaReceivers,vrgdaSplits,address(0),address(0),deployer)](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L329)
	- [_createAuction()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L114)
		- [verbId = verbs.mint()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L260-L269)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [_settleAuction()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L113)
		- [IWETH(WETH).deposit{value: _amount}()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L354)
		- [creatorTokensEmitted = tokenEmitter.buyToken{value: creatorGovernancePayment}(vrgdaReceivers,vrgdaSplits,address(0),address(0),deployer)](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L329)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [_createAuction()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L114)
		- [auction = Auction({verbId:verbId,amount:0,startTime:startTime,endTime:endTime,bidder:address(0),settled:false})](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L264)
	[VerbsAuctionHouse.auction](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L68) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [VerbsAuctionHouse._createAuction()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L259-L270)
	- [VerbsAuctionHouse.auction](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L68)
	- [VerbsAuctionHouse.unpause()](src/VerbsAuctionHouse.sol#L215-L221)
